summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Building Department, authorizing an amendment to a real estate contract to correct the legal description in the sale of a portion of the former Juanita Gravel Pit located in the Northeast Quarter of the Northwest Quarter of Section 29, Township 26 North, Range 5 East, W.M. (arbitrary file address known as 10799 Northeast 132nd Street, Kirkland, Washington), and amending Section 1 of Ordinance 108037.
